support.title: Hall of Fame
support.descp:
A huge THANK YOU from us!
You are contributing to the cause, making this project a reality. And that's a Big Deal for us.
Your name will be listed into the Hall of Fame of our website as Supporter. Plus, you'll be able to download our app from our website.

support.title: Swag Bag
support.descp: T-shirt, hat, Thank you email from the founding team and lots of other goodies (including a branded USB drive with the video making of). Be the first to know about the updates and have the opportunity to be our brand evangelist.

support.title: One BEST ebike smartbox + smartphone app
support.descp:
Save 35% off the 186 Euro retail price.
Connectivity Smartbox and APP only. Please choose this reward only if you are skilled in EV building and you are experienced in coupling motors with third-party batteries and controllers.

support.title: Early Bird - One BEST ebike MOTOR 1500 W
support.descp:
Save 49% off the 1100 Euro retail price.
Motor + Mounting bracket only. Battery and controller are NOT included. Please choose this reward only if you are skilled in EV building and you are experienced in coupling motors with third-party batteries and controllers.
